title: Daily Planning and Animal Care
text: My day at the dairy farm. We use gloves and masks when handling chemicals. We plan the day: planting, irrigation, and equipment checks. I clean the barn after milking and store the tools. Irrigation is scheduled to reduce water waste. I talk to the team and assign tasks for the afternoon. The greenhouse helps control temperature and humidity. The sun is low, and the soil is cool and soft. I check the crops to see if the plants are healthy. I feed the cows and make sure they have clean water. Veterinary biosecurity keeps the herd healthy.
